reply.analysis: The app declares the collection of data from various sources as mentioned in the privacy policy.
reply.reference: We collect information about you from a variety of sources, including... URL: https://www.wayhaven.com/policies/privacy-policy

source_documents.excerpt:
Privacy policy
Updated: April 17, 2025
This Privacy Notice describes how Wayhaven (“our,” “we”) collects, uses, and shares personal information. In particular, this Privacy Notice applies to:
- Our website at https://www.wayhaven.com/ is available to the general public (our “Website”). This Privacy Notice applies to visitors to our Website (“Visitors”).
- Our other online services we operate that post this Notice (“Services”). As a central part of our Services, we support organizations (“Organiz...

contact them directly or refer to their privacy notice(s). This Privacy Notice does not apply to information that cannot be identified to any individual, household, or their devices, such as de-identified or anonymized information.
Information we collect
We collect information about you from a variety of sources, including:
- Directly from you when you provide it to us.
- Automatically as you utilize the Website or Services.
- From third parties, including analytics providers.
Information direct...

not respond to “do not track” signals or other mechanisms that provide consumers the ability to exercise choice regarding the collection of personally identifiable information about an individual consumer’s online activities over time and across third-party websites or online services.

may include your date and time you access our Website and Services and the pages and content you access during your visit, websites that you link to or from, whether you receive or open an email or other communication from us, and the links you click on within those emails, the type of device used and the operating system on that device, browser type, and any errors encountered. We may also collect information from your mobile device or your computer about how you interact with our Website and S...

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects data such as name, email address, company name/affiliation, account credentials, demographic information, and data regarding the user's interactions with the app.

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the sections of the privacy policy that mention the direct collection of data from users, including personal information and usage data.
reply.reference: The app collects data such as name, email address, company name/affiliation, account credentials, demographic information, and data regarding the user's interactions with the app. URL: https://www.wayhaven.com/policies/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use by mentioning that they collect information for various purposes including supporting Organization and User access to the Website and Services, managing user accounts, providing well-being coaching, sending promotional materials, providing customer support, improving user experience, ensuring regulatory compliance, preventing fraud, and addressing disputes.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app uses the data collected for a variety of purposes, indicating a clear declaration of the purpose of data collection and use.
reply.reference: We may use data we collect to operate our business and for a variety of purposes, including the following: - To support Organization and User access to the Website and Services and to manage your account with us, including the provision of well-being coaching to Users and aggregate reporting to Organizations. - To maintain, analyze, customize, and improve your experience on our Website and Services. - To communicate with Organizations and Users about our Website and Services, to send promotional and marketing materials, and to provide you information that you request from us. - To provide customer and technical support. - To monitor and enforce our contracts, legal terms, acceptable use or other policies or similar terms. - To comply with law and satisfy our regulatory and compliance obligations. Additionally, to support compliance efforts on behalf of others and ourselves that support our provision of services to you. - To detect and prevent fraud and other prohibited, illicit or illegal activity, and to protect the rights and vital interests of you, others, and ourselves. - To address existing or anticipated disputes. - To otherwise operate our business, including support for transactions impacting our company as a whole (such as mergers, acquisitions, or asset purchases). - To fulfill any other purpose for which you provide your information to us. - For other purposes permitted by law, described to you when you provide your information or to which you consent. URL: https://www.wayhaven.com/policies/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection by unsubscribing from marketing emails or emailing support@wayhaven.com. Additionally, users can delete their data by contacting support@wayhaven.com with a request to update or delete their information.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can opt out of marketing emails by following the unsubscribe link or emailing support@wayhaven.com. It also mentions that users can request to update or delete their information by contacting support@wayhaven.com.
reply.reference: You may opt out of receiving marketing emails by following the unsubscribe link in each email, or by emailing us at support@wayhaven.com. Please note that you may continue to receive non-marketing emails from us after you opt-out. Please note that we do not control communications from others, including Organizations. If you are a User, you should contact your Organization to understand communication choices they may provide you. N/A. URL: https://www.wayhaven.com/policies/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties as reasonable to operate the business, provide the Website and Services, comply with legal requirements, or as directed by the user.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app shares data with third parties for various purposes such as supporting internal operations, using external services, compliance with legal and regulatory obligations, and corporate transactions.
reply.reference: We may share your information with third parties as reasonable to operate our business, to provide the Website and Services to you and others, as permitted or required by law, or as directed or authorized by you. For example: Third Party Sharing. We work with third party parties to help us provide our Website and Services and to support internal operations. They may use your information subject to their own privacy policies and to comply with their own legal and regulatory obligations. URL: https://www.wayhaven.com/policies/privacy-policy
